mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as receiveUserName,c.name as insertUserName From oilCardStock a left join sys_user b on a.receive_user=b.id left join sys_user c on a.insert_user=c.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into oilCardStock ( type, source, card_type, card_no, money, status, receive_time, receive_user, insert_time, insert_user, update_time, update_user, del_flag) values ( #{type}, #{source}, #{cardType}, #{cardNo}, #{money}, #{status}, #{receiveTime}, #{receiveUser}, #{insertTime}, #{insertUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update oilCardStock
type = #{type},
source = #{source},
card_type = #{cardType},
card_no = #{cardNo},
money = #{money},
status = #{status},
receive_time = #{receiveTime},
receive_user = #{receiveUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}

Update oilCardStock
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
status = #{status},
money = #{money},
receive_user = #{receiveUser},
receive_time = #{receiveTime},
where id = #{id}
